website_summaries.verdict: Forget that it's a gaming console: the Xbox One S is an incredible 4K Blu-ray player that just so happens to also stream video and play games.
pros: Frequent software updates keep the Xbox One S current on playback features
Full support for all major streaming apps
cons: There's no traditional remote included, so you'll either need to buy one or use a game controller

website_summaries.verdict: An excellent way to get your hands on a huge collection of Xbox One games to discover new favorites and replay old gems via Xbox Game Pass, all at a fairly inexpensive price for a new console.
pros: Explore a wide range of quality games with 3 months of Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Live
Play hundreds of games for free
cons: The trial memberships only last 3 months each, but any game bought via Xbox Game Pass comes with a nice discount!
